sections.text:
81-1449.Advisory council members; expenses.

Members of the advisory council to the Office of Violence Prevention shall serve without compensation but may be reimbursed for expenses incurred in the performance of their duties as provided in sections 81-1174 to 81-1177.

SourceLaws 2009, LB63, ยง 39;Laws 2020, LB381, ยง 118.
